data.title: GLASS: Parallel, free-form gravitational lens modeling tool and framework
data.name: glass
data.description: A parallel, free-form gravitational lens modeling tool and framework

evidence: "GLASS is a software package for modeling strong gravitianal lenses. It produces an ensemble of possible models that fit the observed input data" (end-user modeling application).
"GLASS can be downloaded as a .zip file or using git from GitHub: https://github.com/jpcoles/glass" (distribution via source repository/zip).

"GLASS and the GLPK can be built simply by running the command 'make' in the glass source code directory. ... It will also build and install GLASS. ... there is a script called 'run_glass' which will execute GLASS" (built and run as an application for scientific modeling).
